name: Snowriders
description:
Inspired by Snowboard Kids 1 & 2, this game hopes to create the sequel we should've gotten.

I am one dude doing this as my first foray into game design. This is a year of work so far, but it's definitely not done.

The game is currently for absolutely free due to a few illegal assets still being used as placeholders (mostly music, plus some item sprites). The game eventually might cost something if it actually goes anywhere worth it.

Up to four players can play locally. There is a single-player mode which will eventually have a story, a battle mode, and a challenge (time trial) mode. While all the characters look like exactly the same guy, they do have different stats. Experiment with them! They need to be balanced.

Report any bugs, glitches, suggestions, or complaints to redaun.amarien@gmail.com.
